definitions.definition: A medicine or drug, especially a cathartic or purgative.
The art or profession of healing disease; medicine.
To administer medicine to, especially a purgative.
The branch of science concerned with the study of the properties and interactions of space, time, matter and energy.
definitions.example: Newtonian physics was extended by Einstein to explain the effects of travelling near the speed of light; quantum physics extends it to account for the behaviour of atoms.

definitions.definition: The physical aspects of a phenomenon or a system, especially those studied scientifically.
definitions.example: The physics of car crashes would not let Tom Cruise walk away like that.
